Interrupts.Name: Suprise!
Interrupts.Trigger: The mimic is targeted by an ability, and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The mimic is revealed and dashes up to 3 spaces. An adjacent foe must then save or take [D]+[fray], or just [fray] damage on a failed save.

Actions.Name: Bone-cracker
Actions.Hit: [D], a number of times equal to the round number.
Actions.Miss: 2 damage, a number of times equal to the round number.
Actions.Effects: The mimic may dash 2 before making this attack. Reveals the mimic. Deals half damage if the mimic is revealed before making this attack.

Actions.Name: Shell Game
Actions.Description: Swap places with a decoy, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Scuttling Retreat
Actions.Description: The mimic creates 2 decoys anywhere in range 4, then secretly replaces one of them.
